content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-85 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (x=37.0, y=-85.0), (x=39.0, y=-85.0), and (x=41.0, y=-86.0)
- Collection chests at positions (x=36.5, y=-86.5), (x=39.5, y=-83.5), and (x=40.5, y=-87.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (x=35.5, y=-86.5) and (x=35.5, y=-85.5) for coal movement

### Iron/Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at position(x=-28 to -20, y=-61 to -55)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
- Three stone furnaces at positions (x=-27.0, y=-58.0), (x=-23.0, y=-58.0), and (x=-21.0, y=-58.0)
- Collection chests at positions (x=-27.5, y=-59.5), (x=-24.5, y=-58.5), and (x=-22.5, y=-55.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for ore/plate movement at positions (x=-26.5, y=-59.5), (x=-25.5, y=-58.5), (x=-28.5, y=-57.5), (x=-22.5, y=-56.5)

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59 to -57)
Consists of following entities:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (x=-10.0, y=-59.0), (x=-8.0, y=-59.0), and (x=-6.0, y=-59.0)
- Collection chests at positions (x=-9.5, y=-57.5), (x=-7.5, y=-57.5), and (x=-5.5, y=-57.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (x=-6.5, y=-57.5), (x=-7.5, y=-56.5), (x=-4.5, y=-57.5)

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 8, y=0 to 4)
Consists of following entities:
- Four stone furnaces at positions (x=0.0, y=0.0), (x=2.0, y=0.0), (x=4.0, y=0.0), and (x=6.0, y=0.0)
- Collection chests and inserters arranged in input/output pattern
- Multiple burner inserters for material movement

### Power Generation Complex at position(x=-3 to 4, y=17 to 27)
Consists of following entities:
- Steam engine at position (x=4.5, y=20.5)
- Boiler at position (x=-1.5, y=22.0)
- Offshore pump at position (x=-3.5, y=27.5)
- Connected by pipe network (fluid systems 9599 and 9601)

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Positioning Errors
- Ensure target entity exists at specified position before attempting operations
- Double check coordinates when referencing entities, especially mining drills

### Resource Management Errors
- Verify sufficient fuel (coal) in inventory before attempting to refuel entities
- Monitor coal levels in mining drills to prevent them from running out of fuel

### Entity Access Errors
- Ensure agent is within range of target entities when performing operations
- Verify correct entity type when attempting to interact with specific positions

### Belt and Inserter Setup Issues
- Check for proper alignment of inserters with input/output positions
- Ensure transport belts are properly connected in intended direction
